question: Why the Soviet Socialist Revolution on October is celebrated every year on November 7?
option1: Lenin’s birthday falls on this date
option2: Russia’s victory over Germany coincides with this date
option3: The Provisional Government formed after the collapse of Czarist Government was overthrown on this day in 1917
answer: The Provisional Government formed after the collapse of Czarist Government was overthrown on this day in 1917
explanation: During October Revolution, urban workers began to organize into councils wherein revolutionaries criticized the provisional government and its actions.  Bolshevik Red Guards forces under the Military Revolutionary Committee began the occupation of government buildings on 7 November 1917.
